directions: Lightly grease a large casserole dish. Arrange the squash, onions, and red bell pepper in the dish. Place in the microwave, and cook on High 10 minutes, stirring once, until tender.

Gently mix the mushrooms, green chile peppers, jalapeno peppers, cheese, and sour cream into the dish. Sprinkle with crushed tortilla chips. Cover dish, and cook in the microwave 10 minutes on Medium-high power, or until cheese is melted and casserole is heated through.
ingredients: 2 pounds yellow squash, cut in 1/4 inch slices
1 red bell pepper, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers
1 (8 ounce) package shredded Monterey Jack cheese
title: Southwest Squash Casserole
